property.name: Address
property.tp:docstring: IPv4 address. FIXME: what about multiple addresses?

property.name: Hostname
property.tp:docstring: The hostname associated with this IPv4 address. FIXME: what about multiple hostnames?

property.name: Domains
property.tp:docstring: A list of domains this address belongs to.

property.name: NisDomain
property.tp:docstring: The NIS domain this address belongs to.

property.name: NisServers
property.tp:docstring: The NIS servers associated with this address.
